 CxList objects = All.FindByFileName("*.object");

// This is the list we can update with all sanitizer-types in sobjects:
string[] objTypes = {"checkbox", "currency", "date", "datetime", "email", "lookup", "masterdetail", "number", "percent", "phone"};

CxList objectTypes = objects.FindByTypes(objTypes);
/*	CxList objectTypes = objects.FindByType("checkbox") + 
	objects.FindByType("currency") + 
	objects.FindByType("date") + 
	objects.FindByType("datetime") + 
	objects.FindByType("email") + 
	objects.FindByType("lookup") + 
	objects.FindByType("masterdetail") + 
	objects.FindByType("number") + 
	objects.FindByType("percent") + 
	objects.FindByType("phone");
*/
CxList objectTypesRef = objectTypes;
CxList classes = objects.GetClass(objectTypes);

System.Collections.SortedList membersList = new System.Collections.SortedList();
System.Collections.SortedList classList = new System.Collections.SortedList();
foreach (CxList objType in objectTypes)
{
	CxList cl = classes.GetClass(objType);
	CSharpGraph g = objType.data.GetByIndex(0) as CSharpGraph;
	CSharpGraph gClass = cl.data.GetByIndex(0) as CSharpGraph;
	membersList[gClass.ShortName + "." + g.ShortName] = gClass.ShortName + "." + g.ShortName;
	classList[gClass.ShortName] = gClass.ShortName;
}

System.Collections.SortedList refList = new System.Collections.SortedList();
foreach (string cls in classList.GetKeyList())
{
	CxList ret = Find_Apex_Files().FindByType(cls).GetFathers().FindByType(typeof(ReturnStmt));
	CxList level2 = Find_Apex_Files().GetMethod(ret);
	level2 = All.FindAllReferences(level2).GetMembersOfTarget();
	refList[cls] = level2;
}

foreach (string member in membersList.GetKeyList())
{
	string gClass = member.Substring(0, member.IndexOf("."));
	string g = member.Substring(member.IndexOf(".") + 1);
	objectTypesRef += All.FindByMemberAccess(member);
	objectTypesRef += (refList[gClass] as CxList).FindByShortName("get" + g);
}

result = objectTypesRef;

// Sanitizers in standard fields that get created on custom objects
CxList nonJS = Find_Non_JS_Code().GetTargetOfMembers().GetMembersOfTarget();
CxList VFnonJS = Find_VF_Pages() * nonJS;
VFnonJS -= VFnonJS.FindByAssignmentSide(CxList.AssignmentSide.Left);
CxList standardFields = All.NewCxList();

standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getId", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getIsDeleted", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getCreatedById", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getCreatedDate", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getLastModifiedById", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getLastModifiedDate", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getSystemModstamp", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getLastModifiedBy", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getOwner", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getOwnerId", false);
standardFields += VFnonJS.FindByShortName("getCreatedBy", false);
standardFields -= standardFields.FindByName("$*");
result += standardFields;
